definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: †[[מָסַךְ]] vb. mix, produce by mixing (cf. perh. [[מזג]], [[מֶזֶג]] Ba:ES 33, 51);—

pour, only fig., [[בְּקִרְבָּהּ]] ´[[מ]] [[רוּחַ עִוְעִים]] Is 19:14 (subj. ´[[מ]]); mix, c. acc. [[שֵׁכָר]] Is 5:22; i.e. make a choice drink by mixing with spices, etc. (mixing with water came later, cf. 2Ma 15:39) Löw:p. 419 Frä:162 f, 171 f. Now:Arch. 1, 120 Benz:Arch. 95; obj. [[יַיִן]] fig., subj. wisdom Pr 9:2, Pr 9:5; [[שִׁקֻּוַי בִּבְכִי מָסָָכְתִּי]] Ps 102:10 my drink with weeping have I mixed (v. As. [akâl] ul âkul, bikîtum kurmati, mê ul aštî, dîmtu maštîtî Zim:BP 34).
